OOC: I'm not sure where Warhead is, but I'll assume he's been 
transferred to CR.

BIC: The CR chamber finished its job, or rather the job it could do.

CR chamber: Unit Warhead repaired at the best of capacities. Energon 
presence too excessive. Some circuits damaged beyond repairs. 
Consciousness back.

Warhead opened his eyes after a long moment. His motricity circuits 
were not responding and acted on their, when they could, that is. His 
commlink and language circuits still functionned, though, so he called 
Megatron.

Warhead: Megatron, this is Warhead. I have been hurt bad and some of 
my circuits are not responding. Can you come down here, I have to talk 
with you about important matters.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> ooC: Airly, I'm not quite sure what is happening here, or what this 
> weapon is for that matter. I was kinda waiting for Perceptor to 
> finish what he started since Megatron already sorta gave the go-
> ahead.
> 
> -- Megatron --
> 
> Megatron frowns and taps his finger repetitively on his chair.
> 
> "Perceptor, hurry this up, we have things that need to be done." He 
> growls as he worries about an futur Maximal attack and the 
> inadequate current base defenses.
> 
> He stands, "If you're done, then get to the storage bay and make it 
> quick. There's work to do." He smiles as he puts his his lackies to 
> work.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "catmastero" <catmastero@y...> wrote:
> 
> > "But Waspinator not know what to do" Waspinator replied.
